Name: Plexiglass
Script: if(self.dice + self.extradice == 1 # target.dice + target.extradice == 1) { self.textparticle(~Can't go lower!~); } else { self.extradice--; target.extradice--; sfx(~magic_gaindice~); }

Name: Obfuscate
Script: inflict(BLIND|2); sfx(~_blind~);

Name: Science
Script: var r = rand([1|1|1|1|2|2|2|3|3|4|5]); inflict(BLIND| r); sfx(~_blind~); // you could probably do this without r by just putting the rand in place of it; but this is how the official items do it so what-ever

Name: Neutron Star
Script: if(turn % 2 == 0) { attack(8); sfxdamage(target|8); } else { attack(4); sfxdamage(target|4); }

Name: Berlin Nerf OMG
Description: Set a dice to your highest dice
Script: var dicelist = []; var max = 0; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ dicelist.push(mydice);  if (mydice.basevalue > max) { max = mydice.basevalue; } } } if(dicelist.length > 0 && max > 0) { shuffle(dicelist); dicelist[0].animatereroll(max| self.screenposition()); }

Name: Healthy Eating
Script: self.maxhp +=2; attackself(-2); sfx(~_heal~); Gadget.changegadget(self| ~Healthy Eating~| ~Broken Gadget~); //kale salad used to be the only way of raising max hp; builds exploiting kale salad with hookshot and a breakable enemy (like paper knight) were called 'healthy eating' builds at least once

Name: Electrify
Script: var r = rand([1|1|1|1|2|2|2|3|3|4|5]); inflict(SHOCK| r); sfx(~_shock~);

Name: Underwhelm
Script: if(!self.getvar(~underwhelm~) > 0) {self.setvar(~underwhelm~|5);} attack(self.getvar(~underwhelm~)); sfxdamage(target|self.getvar(~underwhelm~)); if(self.getvar(~underwhelm~) > 1) {self.setvar(~underwhelm~|self.getvar(~underwhelm~)-1);} // base value of underwhelm; 5; was _merged into inventor gadgets. also yes; i use semicolons instead of commas; do; not; mock me;;;;;;

Name: Dice Bash
Script: var dicelist = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ dicelist.push(mydice); }} if(dicelist.length > 0) { shuffle(dicelist); attack(dicelist[0]); sfxdamage(target|dicelist[0]); }

Name: Phillips Head
Script: if (self.getvar(~phillip~) != true) { attack(3); self.setvar(~phillip~|true); } else { attack(6); } // _merge inventor gadgets shenanigans

Name: Rod
Script: var p = (target.hp / 6); pierceattack(p); sfxdamage(target|p);

Name: Perfectionism
Script: var availabledice = []; var evens = 0; var odds = 0; var oddparity = false; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ availabledice.push(mydice); if (mydice.basevalue % 2 == 0) { evens++; } else { odds++; } } } if(availabledice.length > 0) { if(evens > odds) { oddparity = true; } else if(evens == odds) { oddparity = rand([false|true]); } if(oddparity == false) { for(mydice in availabledice){ if mydice.basevalue % 2 == 0 { mydice.animatereroll(mydice.basevalue - 1|self.screenposition()); } } } else { for(mydice in availabledice) { if mydice.basevalue % 2 == 1 { mydice.animatereroll(mydice.basevalue + 1|self.screenposition()); } } } else { self.textparticle(~No effect!~); }

Name: Purify
Script: var statuslist = [POISON|FIRE|SHOCK|ICE|WEAKEN|CURSE|BLIND|FURY|LOCK|SHIELD|REDUCE|DODGE|THORNS]; for(st in statuslist) { if(getstatus(st) > 0) { removestatus(st|ALL); } if(getstatusself(st) > 0) { removestatusself(st|ALL); } } sfx(~_cure~);

Name: Scabbard (1/2)
Script: giveequipment(~Sacrificial Blade@2~|true|false); Gadget.changegadget(self|~Scabbard (1/2)~| ~Broken Gadget~);

Name: Scabbard+ (1/4)
Script: giveequipment(~Sacrificial Blade@2+~|true|false); Gadget.changegadget(self|~Scabbard+ (1/4)~| ~Broken Gadget~);

Name: Scabbard (2/2)
Script: giveequipment(~Sacrificial Blade@1~|true|false); Gadget.changegadget(self|~Scabbard (2/2)~| ~Broken Gadget~);

Name: Scabbard+ (2/4)
Script: giveequipment(~Sacrificial Blade@1+~|true|false); Gadget.changegadget(self|~Scabbard+ (2/4)~| ~Broken Gadget~);

Name: Scabbard+ (3/4)
Script: giveequipment(~Sacrificial Blade@0+~|true|false); Gadget.changegadget(self|~Scabbard+ (3/4)~| ~Broken Gadget~);

Name: Scabbard+ (4/4)
Script: giveequipment(~Sacrificial Blade@X+~|true|false); Gadget.changegadget(self|~Scabbard+ (4/4)~| ~Broken Gadget~);

Name: Deep Breath
Script: for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ mydice.removedice(self.screenposition()); attackself(-3); }} // actually an official item that was scrapped - see https://github.com/TerryCavanagh/diceydungeonsbeta/issues/264

Name: Delude
Script: //inflict(~ncr_vanish~); sfx(~_vanish~);

Name: Strobe Light
Script: //var r = rand([1|1|1|1|2|2|2|3|3|4|5]); inflict(~ncr_vanish~| r); sfx(~_vanish~);

Name: Hadoken
Script: //attack(3|VANISH); sfx(~_vanish~);

Name: Briar Bush
Script: inflictself(THORNS|2); sfx(~_thorns~);

Name: Aura Channeling
Script: //inflict(VANISH);

Name: THE [200%]GASDGFET
Script: attack(2); sfxdamage(999);

Name: Light Switch
Description: Copy a dice for next turn
Script: var dicelist = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available()){ dicelist.push(mydice); }} if(dicelist.length > 0) { shuffle(dicelist); inflictself(~stash~+dicelist[0]); inflictself(~ncr_lightswitch~+dicelist[0]); sfx(~magic~); }

Name: Install Evony
Script: jinx(~Install Evony~|~each equipment use will raise CPU by 1~|~Each equipment use will raise CPU by 1~|~inflict(\~cpuvirus\~| 1); sfx(\~magic\~);~|self|self|1|0); sfx(~_thinghappens~);

Name: impulse 101
Script: jinx(~impulse 101~|~increase Jackpot range~|~Increase Jackpot range~|~target.roll_range += 1; sfx(\~useitem\~);~|self|self|1|0); sfx(~_thinghappens~);

Name: Less Fluff Old
Script: var cardlist = []; for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.ready && eq.name != ~Inventor Gadgets~) { cardlist.push(eq); } } if(cardlist.length > 0) { shuffle(cardlist); Gadget.givegadget(self|cardlist[0].gadget|true); removeequipment(cardlist[0].name); sfx(~_cure~); cardlist.remove(cardlist[0]); } if (cardlist.length > 0) { Gadget.reactivate(self|~Less Fluff~); } //  self.textparticle(~No cards left!~);

Name: Less Fluff Old 2
Script: var cardlist = []; for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.ready && eq.name != self.getskillcard().name /*&& eq.gadget != ~Broken Gadget~*/) { cardlist.push(eq); } } if(cardlist.length > 0) { Gadget.givegadget(self|cardlist[0].gadget|true); removeequipment(cardlist[0].name); sfx(~_cure~); cardlist.remove(cardlist[0]); self.getskillcard().animate(~flashandshake~); }
